mdRecord.dcterms:title: Second Year Class, 1926-1927
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SOM, Class of 1929 Students unidentifed. Student roster in alphabetical order, not as appears in photos. Walter J. Allegree, Thomas L. Allman, Dewey L. LeBauer, Sidney F. LeBauer, Meyer H. Legum, Archibald A. Little, Henry W. Litvack, Robert B. Lobban, Jules R. London, James L. Long, Robert W.C. McClanahan, Paul R. McFadyen, Alexander T. Mayo, Jose Menedez, Alberto Navaroo, Paul Otto, Minor B. Payne, Robert T. Peirce Jr., Robert E. Peyton, Frederick Pilcher Jr., John A. Pilcher Jr., Charles L. Savage, Lillie S. Shenk, Joseph M.
